ygData.subject: Re: runes
ygData.msgSnippet: Hy all im a wizard 20 lv I wish only to say that i researched with sucess all 16 lv spels and 1 of 20 level spel fire spiral of alkabor and that i failed once
ygData.messageBody:
Hy all im a wizard 20 lv

I wish only to say that i researched with sucess all 16 lv spels and 1 of
20 level spel fire spiral of alkabor and that i failed once at identify
spell with lv 20 in research and that i filed twice on enstill i got 4
advances in skill so my skill is now 24 and all 16 lv spells are trivial
for me and i do them automaticly without failure.

I have made some more spells with advancing runes and i try to sell them im
now in felwithe or i can bring them to karanas, tox or fay if a offer is
interesting. selling only lv 16 spells as i dont have enough runes for 20
lv if you have runes im interested to make you spells guaranted succes.


At 15.57 22/06/99 -0300, you wrote:
>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>I have 5 runes on me, with one duplicate. I've already made myself the
Identify
>spell and Project Lightning spell. I've also made my friend a project
lightning
>spell. I'm currently 3 out of 3 in research. Beginner's luck, I guess..
>
>Anyway, you'll have to buy or trade for runes, no doubt. Every time I enter a
>zone I auction for runes. I do agree that pages and words seem to be much more
>common.
>
>--
>Qenelin
